title: How many instruments can Roger Waters play? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would have thought bass & guitar - but apparently keyboards & trumpet as well! Curiously enough, according to Wikipedia there’s no mention of him playing trumpet or keyboards (nor any mention of his ‘barely being able to play bass’ - but that appears to be evident from comments by fellow bandmates such as the guitarist). Roger Waters - Wikipedia

Well, according to former PF bandmate David Gilmour, he can only barely play the bass. (many of the better bass-moments on PF records was done by Dave, remember that cool fretless bit from The Wall?…that’s Dave)) He can probably play guitar like your uncle at the beach. Great conceptualist though.
